changes: Fixed Discord RPC functionality to properly display current script name.
Fixed rename button in settings - now opens modal instead of broken prompt.
Removed opacity slider from settings as requested.
Discord RPC now correctly shows 'Script 1.lua' format for current tab.
Added 'About' tab with application info and changelog.
Added settings for opacity, Discord RPC, and notifications.
Increased max tabs limit to 30 and added notification for limit.
UI/UX improvements and sectioning in Settings.
Core script editing and execution functionality.
